name: Merge N' Split
description:
Merge n' Split is a submission to the ScoreSpace Jam #14.

The goal of the game is to get the highest score by making the balls pass through the accelerating obstacles, obstacles either have a small, medium, or large gap for the balls to pass through, merge or split the balls to pass through the gaps.

The game continues indefinitely, so aim for the highest score possible. 

Controls: Drag the ball towards another ball and they will merge, click the merged balls and they will split, if you drag a ball towards an empty space it will move towards it.

Important note: Due to the time limitation of the jam this build is for Windows, however the game style works better on smartphones with swipes and taps, it makes the controls much easier.
